## AddZipFileOption interface

Add a local zip file to the code package.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
export interface AddZipFileOption 
```

## Properties

|  Property | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  [localFile](./faastjs.addzipfileoption.localfile.md) | <code>string</code> | The local zip file to add to the code package |
|  [remoteDir](./faastjs.addzipfileoption.remotedir.md) | <code>string</code> | The remote directory where the zip file will be extracted. |
